Good Sri Lankan food and definitely the best local food in Ella. The curries were really nice and very reasonably priced.

If you want to eat good local curries, defo visit matey.
Fantastic, delicious food! The best we had in Sri Lanka so far! Highly recommended for late lunch or early dinner to avoid queue in the evening!
Cold beer, good spicey food, not more is needed. Friendly servers as well. In the menu they have some interesting options.

AMAZING! Long queue to get in but moved swiftly and well worth the wait. Best food I’ve eaten in Sri Lanka so far! We will be heading back tomorrow to try more on the menu!!
